column5: Has anyone fished either one of these lakes near Ignace. Considering a trip there in mid july.Was wondering how the fishin is compared to other lakes in the area and if they are fishable in poor weather. Thanks.

I fished Sowden lake a few years back in the fall. There was some great bass fishing and we caught a few walleyes. I only had one day on the lake and with more time i'm sure I would have found more fish.
I have a friend who grew up in Ignace and has some outpost cabins in that area, they might be able to answer your questions. Their e-mail is: fishing (at sign) berglundoutposts.com
